EmailTemplate.name: RESPONSE ON ACB/IBANK/CASH FOCUS
EmailTemplate.subject: RESPONSE ON ACB/IBANK/CASH FOCUS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
RESPONSE ON ACB/IBANK/CASH FOCUS Good day {!Case.Email_Sender_Name__c} Kindly refer to the contact details below for further information regarding the payment/s. Kind regards {!User.Name} | Service Consultant | Phone:{!User.CSC_Phone__c} Address: 1st Floor, Block B | Barclays Pretoria Campus | 270 Maggs Str | Waltloo | Pretoria
Please consider your environmental responsibility before printing this e-mail. COMPANY CONFIDENTIAL This mail and any attachments are confidential, privileged and for internal use within Absa Bank Limited/Barclays Africa Group Limited only, unless otherwise expressly provided. The contents may not be copied, disclosed and/or distributed to any other person and may only be used for the purpose of the matter to which it relates and the person to whom it is addressed.
